snippet: The Rangers took a 4-0 lead against Ottawa and dominated throughout the victory in the first opening-round series at Madison Square Garden since 1996.
abstract: New York Rangers defeat Ottawa Senators, 4-2, in Game 1 of their NHL Eastern Conference first-round playoff series.
lead_paragraph: The Rangers took a 4-0 lead against Ottawa and dominated throughout the victory in the first opening-round series at Madison Square Garden since 1996.

headline.seo: N.H.L. Playoffs: Rangers Beat Senators for 1-0 Lead in Series
headline.main: Rangers Open Playoffs With a Powerhouse Display
headline.print_headline: Rangers Open Playoffs With a Powerhouse Display
